sentences.sContent: I relish the challenge of doing jobs that others turn down.
sentences.sCn: 我喜欢接受挑战做别人拒绝做的工作。

sentences.sContent: The three men ate with relish.

synos.tran: 滋味；风味；食欲；开胃小菜；含义

remMethod.val: rel(看作real， 真正的) + ish(看作fish， 鱼) → 真正的鱼 → 美味

trans.tranOther: to enjoy an experience or the thought of something that is going to happen
